0.01.name: wordpress/folloyu
0.01.description:
Plugin Overview

This plug-in will assist in the implementation of the Folloyu tab on your WordPress site. Simply insert the JavaScript given by Folloyu to enable the tab. In order to add the tab you will need to register on Folloyu.com.

About Folloyu

Folloyu tab helps your website visitors, move seamlessly between devices, while continuing their activity in your website.

  • Increase users' time on site
  • Increase conversion rates
  • Increase mobile presence
  • Learn about your visitors' mobile habits
